div.p: Codes supported by eHealth Platform differentiating types of civil state. This valueset supports the Belgian federal FHIR profiling effort. Whenever possible add a code from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-MaritalStatus for international interoperability but also use https://www.ehealth.fgov.be/standards/fhir/CodeSystem/CD-CIVILSTATE for the Belgian specific code.

ul.li: Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-MaritalStatus where concept is-a A
Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-MaritalStatus where concept is-a D
Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-MaritalStatus where concept is-a M
Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-MaritalStatus where concept is-a U
Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-MaritalStatus where concept is-a W

div.p: This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

description.value: Codes supported by eHealth Platform differentiating types of civil state. This valueset supports the Belgian federal FHIR profiling effort. Whenever possible add a code from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-MaritalStatus for international interoperability but also use https://www.ehealth.fgov.be/standards/fhir/CodeSystem/CD-CIVILSTATE for the Belgian specific code.
